articles.title: The Rotting Underwater Ballroom of a Victorian Bernie Madoff
articles.description: Beneath the lake of a once lavish Victorian estate built by a flamboyant mining tycoon, a secret awaits… (c) Forgotten Heritage At murkey water’s edge, a stone…
articles.notes: Brilliant and beautiful, the Victorians really had to create a culture of otherworldly fantasy to hide from themselves the mountain of skulls that their society was built on.
